descriptionNullable:
### TODO @ (2023-09-07): Add notebook with examples.

### Context

This synthetic dataset was created for research in power distribution systems.

### Content

The dataset was generated using the [Electric Power Research Institute's (EPRI)](https://www.epri.com/) [OpenDSS](https://sourceforge.net/projects/electricdss/) simulation software. The EPRI ckt5 test feeder circuit is used to generate a comprehensive dataset of measurements. There are 35040 measurements of 1379 single-phase loads, 591 single-phase secondary distribution transformers, and 1 three-phase substation transformer sampled at 15-minute-intervals over 1-year.

Image Source: [Jeswin Thomas](https://www.pexels.com/photo/photography-of-person-holding-flashlight-near-windmills-during-night-time-1154460/)
title: phase_svd
subtitle: ckt5 Test Feeder Circuit

The EPRI ckt5 test feeder circuit is used to generate a comprehensive dataset of measurements.
